website_summaries.verdict: This set of premium stainless steel cookie cutters might be simple, but the quality is superb. An oven safe construction makes this set delightfully versatile.
pros: Made of robust food grade stainless steel
Features smooth, welded seams and rolled tops
Thin blades cut through all dough consistencies with ease
Oven safe construction is ideal for eggs, pancakes, crumpets, and more
Comes with an attractive storage tin and a free recipe eBook
cons: If you're looking for a set with interesting shapes, consider one of our other picks

customer_reviews.title: Good variety slightly difficult to clean
customer_reviews.text: This product came in a very timely manner. I like all the different sizes of rings to choose from and my son had a great time making teeny tiny biscuits out of my leftover dough. My only complaint is that when it came time to clean them I found dough impacted in a small lip around the rim of the cutters. I was able to get it out but it took a lot of spraying with my sink hose. If it had been a solid lip instead of having a space in it I think it would be much easier to maintain.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha B

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Cuts!
customer_reviews.text: Before purchasing these I was using cups to cut with. Having these really does make a world of difference, especially with biscuits. I finally got the layers to show up in my biscuits since I was now cutting the sides instead of smashing them! You can also tell theses are quality made!
customer_reviews.author: Kendall

customer_reviews.title: Seams not as smooth as others have indicated
customer_reviews.text: Some cutters are bent out of shape and not round. Some have seams that aren't smooth and would make a weird dent in the dough (although some seem to have smooth seams, so not sure why all don't). If you don't need these to be perfect, they are probably okay, but if I don't want perfect circles, I can use a knife instead of a cutter. I bought a different metal set before this, and some of the seams were better in this set, but overall the steel was the same thin-ness and flimsy (thus leading to non-circular circles), and some of seams were funky, so really not worth keeping.
customer_reviews.author: SMSS

customer_reviews.title: These are awesome!  Everything you'd want in a set of biscuit cutters.
customer_reviews.text: I researched the hell outta these before buying, and am very happy I did. I didn't want several sets cluttering up my kitchen because of having bought the wrong thing over and over 'til I got it right. I wanted to buy the right ones the FIRST time around. And I believe I did. Love the way they fit in their little round box too. Keeps 'em clean and together in the drawer. They're exactly as advertised, so just read what they say about 'em and figure on it being true -- cuz it is. Very well made, crisp cutting edges, sturdy construction. Very happy with them!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The "ring" is the THING
customer_reviews.text: These rings are the bee's knees! I'd been schlepping along with some old scone cutters but never had the right size it seemed. (the simple egg in the bread hole) version. No longer! I have full choice! The large ring is perfect for plate prep of anything sliced and needing some symmetry in plating. Best of all, they nest and store in a very nice tin (mind to dry before storing). Can't wait to try on some of the cookie recipes. K&S sent a very nice E-book of recipes which now resides in Evernote. Would definitely buy again! They would make a great Christmas present for those who venture into the kitchen!!
customer_reviews.author: pmthomas

customer_reviews.title: Great multi-purpose kitchen tool
customer_reviews.text: The item ordered was exactly what I was expecting. To be honest, I ordered this set for different reasons than just being biscuit cutters. I use the larger rings to perfectly shape my custom ground burgers.... when you take the time to properly source your ingredients, such as beef, and process/grind it yourself... you want the absolute best option to prepare and cook them. These work flawlessly for that purpose. Also, I use the different size molds with my homemade pasta - ravioli's, tortellini's, ect.... the possibilities are endless. The biggest factor with these rings is not having the lip on the inside. They clean easily and perform multiple tasks, at a great price. What more could you ask for?
customer_reviews.author: Steven J. Fiorey, IITop Contributor: Baseball

customer_reviews.title: Use it every single day for 4 years
customer_reviews.text: Use this product in the heavy duty Bakeshop for 4 years and all the cutters still perfect like day 1. One thing to complain about is the container rust like crazy. Maybe you just need to dry it real good before you put it back in there.
customer_reviews.author: Kewalee

customer_reviews.title: This is so smart. How have I gone my whole life without having these?
customer_reviews.text: The nesting cookie cutters in the round tin are PERFECT! Now I have every size round cutter I need, and NO clutter in my baking stash from all of the cutters. I used the 1.5" (also the cutter two sizes larger) to cut out Petit Fours yesterday. Super clean cutouts, no problems going through the frozen/frosted/fruity cake layers. Cleanup was easy... just made sure to dry them 100 before returning them to the tin. I LOVE them... thank you so much for making my life easier. My cakes looked awesome and stayed nice even through the fondant pour (messy edges make the fondant part a real pain, but I didn't have that issue at all this time).
customer_reviews.author: Accidentally Awesome

customer_reviews.title: Exceeds expectations
customer_reviews.text: I needed some biscuit cutters, and intended to buy one of those traditional big ones with the handles. This seemed like such a better deal, though, and the reviews tipped the scales. They don't rust. They're sharp enough to cut cleanly through dough. They look nice. They stack together in a nice tin - loose enough to pull one out but not so loose that they rattle too much. The seams are cleanly welded. The set has every size you need, from donut holes to donuts. They're strong and sturdy. I see no flaws in these and they're a good value. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: B. Barcellos

customer_reviews.title: These are awesome
customer_reviews.text: Love them! My husband was so excited. They are exactly as described, sturdy and wonderful. We look forward to having them for years! They're not SHARP so I'm not worried about our 4 year old helping. The tin they come in is convenient, I loved their packaging and they're easy to clean. Would definitely purchase again for my baking friends.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THESE!
customer_reviews.text: I used them to make crackers and they were great. So many sizes to pick from, it would be really difficult NOT to pick out the size you needed. Dough didn't stick, they were really easy to clean and they come in their own container to keep them in. Would most definitely recommend them!
customer_reviews.author: kathleen king

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful product. I enjoyed making cookie with my grandchildren using the cookie cutters. We use all the sizes just for fun and Sunday morning I used them to make round eggs and pancakes they thought I was the best grandmother of all time. The cookie cutters are easy to clean, they cut well into the cookie dough and if you spray them with Pam they are easy to use when making pancakes and eggs. I especially love the fact that they do not have that seam that seems to catch all the cookie dough, which can be a safety hazard. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Pinklady Pelote

customer_reviews.title: Happy baking
customer_reviews.text: These cookie cutters are great! They seem sturdy and resistant to becoming misshapen. The metal box, however, is really the best feature. Admittedly, I just love tin boxes; so, it’s great to finally have an excuse to buy one for functional reasons. The box is key to all the cutters staying in good condition during storage. Previously, my biggest problem with biscuit cutter/round cookie cutters is that they get all banged by other baking tools (measuring cups, rolling pin, pastry brush - seriously, it’s like the Wild West in there) sitting in my baking drawer. They end up looking like wompy, lopsided ovals. No more sad doughnuts/biscuits/cookies at my house...problem solved!
customer_reviews.author: J. Calabro

customer_reviews.title: The curved overhang on the top of the cutters makes them comfortable to use
customer_reviews.text: These came in quickly and are very high quality - they were all perfectly circular and work well. The curved overhang on the top of the cutters makes them comfortable to use. I love that they come in a case so I can keep them together and they take up less space in our pantry. Great buy! I have not yet washed them, so I cannot comment on whether they will rust over time, but I will update my review when I do.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Cull

customer_reviews.title: It appears the better quality stainless steel and welded seams are worth the ...
customer_reviews.text: After reading reviews for the various cooker cutters available. It appears the better quality stainless steel and welded seams are worth the few extra pennies. I like the ample selection of sizes as this allows me to better fit my many different baking trays for making jam tarts or mini fruit pies with pastry tops to fit. Compared to the old cookie cutters I have been using the shape of the rings do not distort while handling. Most probably due to a heavier gauge material being used, All in all I consider this to be a very good purchase..
customer_reviews.author: NLA

customer_reviews.title: NICE QUALITY STAINLESS STEEL BISCUIT/COOKIE CUTTERS
customer_reviews.text: Very well designed cookie/biscuit cutters. I really appreciate the solid stainless steel metal. It’s easy to cut dough, and very easy to clean. Each cutter is inscribed with the size of the ring. The storage container is great! I’m very pleased with this product. Very nice heirloom quality that will surely be handed down to my grandchildren.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Southam

customer_reviews.title: I can't think of any way these could be better.
customer_reviews.text: Haven't used them yet. I am going to use them for soap designs. These are worth the extra money. The size of each round is written on each one. I had a hard time finding the seams. Feel sturdy. The roles tops are nice. They fit neatly I the case. There is also a size chart that fits in the case. They are dishwasher safe. I can't think of any way these could be better. Pay the extra $2 & get these. Why take a chance on the cheaper ones.
customer_reviews.author: Sixeyes

customer_reviews.title: Definitely durable
customer_reviews.text: I have yet to use these as life has been full of doings. They'll get their first test drive this week for "yellow-eyed susan" eggs. As to their material quality and durability... I opened the shipping box in my van and through a series of mishaps all of the cutters ended up in various places on the floor rolling helter-skelter. Once retrieved I notice that each one held its shape perfectly. Robust indeed.
customer_reviews.author: Molly Hale

customer_reviews.title: Great idea for a gift either for you or someone else.
customer_reviews.text: The product has a fine shape and nests well. The edges are sharp enough to make a clean cut leaving the dough well designed to have an oven-spring and rise. The handy rainbow circle guide does not match the actual sizes of the cutter rings, but gives you enough detail to know whether you are using the right size ring. The instructions indicate to hand wash and dry - advisable. Make sure the rings are not damp before putting them back into the container.
customer_reviews.author: Texascook

customer_reviews.title: Works for my baking purposes.
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought these to give as a gift but the tin that the set of cutters came in was so dented that I just kept it instead. I wish people took pride in their products and would inspect before sending out. The cutters do work for my purposes, it is nice to have a large selection of sizes to choose from, the cutters themselves seem sturdy a little hard to clean up near the edge.
customer_reviews.author: KD Williams

customer_reviews.title: Exceptional Product.
customer_reviews.text: Everything I'd hoped for. Extremely well made. Quite frankly, I'm surprised a set of cutters of this quality can sell for this price. I'm wondering what else these fine folks manufacture? It's time to spend a little time on their website. I'll certainly consider buying more products from K & S Artisan. Seriously, folks, these cutters are that good! Do yourself a favor... If you're looking for a new set of cutters, consider these first.
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: Great quality cutters with a storage tin
customer_reviews.text: I love these cutters! I've been using a crappy, out-of-round cutter for years but after watching "The Great British Bake Off" I thought it was time to invest in some good quality baking gear. These cutters are well made with a nice sharp edge in 11 sizes. The sizes are marked on the side. I like the tin, it protects them and makes them easy to store. A great product for a great price. They would make a great present for the baker in your life.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Great Product For The Price
customer_reviews.text: These cutters are a great addition to anyone's kitchen if you want a simple, easy to use product. The owner of the company will contact you personally after your purchase to see if you're satisfied with the product. Help grow this small company. Support K&S Artisan
customer_reviews.author: rowdyrazorback

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Different sizes for anything. Sturdy and solid feeling. Not too sharp. Seem is smooth inside and out. Came bagged contents of tin were shrink wrapped.
customer_reviews.author: nm

customer_reviews.title: It’s OK
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking set. Looks to be OK. Has some unknown substance under the seal on the rings so I’ve hesitated in using them.
customer_reviews.author: L.Boogie

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and deep
customer_reviews.text: We used the cutters this holiday to make mini-tacos by cutting larger soft tacos into smaller rounds. We also used them for making cookies. I like the depth of the cutters and look forward to using them for making English muffins, which is what I had in mind when I purchased them. The stainless steel is thick with sturdy seams. This is just what I need in the kitchen. My only minor criticism is I would like a slightly sharper cutting edge. Cutting the original tacos into smaller rounds would have been easier with a sharper cutting edge. But frankly, that is being over critical because cutting cookie or bread dough is effortless. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony J Troppito

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a nice set of circular cutters for culinary school. I have an upcoming Baking and Pastry class. I was hopeful when I ordered this set and happy once I received it. Sturdy, I feel they can hold up to multiple uses by myself and classmates because I share my supplies. I'm very sure the size indications will come in handy also, it was a factor when I decided to purchase these.
customer_reviews.author: E. Turner

customer_reviews.title: You won't go wrong with these cutters!
customer_reviews.text: These have to be the best cookie cutters I have ever purchased! I was primarily buying them to cut out biscuits, and these cutters make very short work of it! Plus they are stainless steel so they won't rust. I did receive a note from the manufacturer who advised not to store the cutters in the tin they came in because the actual container will rust.
customer_reviews.author: Mairzy

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I expected..happy!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I expected! They come in their own tin to protect them and keep them organized. Worth the price! I have had a lot of other cookie cutters and biscuit cutters that ended up rusting in my pantry which was very disappointing and costly. I picked these because of the material they are made and will not rust. The variety of sizes and heavy duty construction will be great for cakes and cookies!
customer_reviews.author: franticchef

customer_reviews.title: Great cutters finally!!
customer_reviews.text: I am really impressed with these K&S BEST Heavy Duty cutters. After purchasing several different brands over the years I have finally found a set that are worth keeping. They are strong enough to hold up to cutting through heavy dough and tall enough to cut through thick dough. I am impressed with the fast delivery and the kindness shown by the selling company too. No more using jar lids, bottle tops, pill bottles, and other desperate measures to approximate the right size I thought something needed to be because I can make it perfectly now!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Jo Willsey

customer_reviews.title: Quality Biscuit & Cookie Cutters
customer_reviews.text: New to biscuit making and I did an extensive search looking for a quality product. I wasn’t wrong in choosing a K&S product. Cutters are heavy gauge for durability; cuts cleanly with no ruff edges. Top has a strong rolled edge for stability & hand protection when pressing. Even the container holding all these cutters was a heavy gauge & seals securely! What was a major plus & swayed my decision.....each cutter was clearly engraved with it’s specific size. K&S may be a small business but they put thought into their product design. Thank you K&S!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa N.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, versatile, attractive biscuit/cookie cutter set
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice set of stainless steel biscuit/cookie (and a lot more) cutters. There's every size a person could want. The rounds are sturdy and handle well. I like their being a set in a box--easy to find, easy to store. The rolled top edge is comfortable and looks good. I haven't owned the set long enough to know whether the water that gets into the roll during washing might eventually be a problem, but even if so, I suspect "eventually" will be a long time coming.
customer_reviews.author: anne reeves

customer_reviews.title: No more fumbling in the drawer!
customer_reviews.text: Had been unsuccessfully searching stores for years for a good stainless set of cookie cutters. I searched Amazon but was not happy until I found these. No protruding seam where they have been welded. Clean easily. We use them (so far) for making individual portions of crab mayonnaise on salads, and for mincemeat tarts this holiday season. Also, drawing circles without a compass. I am sure we will be finding more uses for these. Big plus is no more fumbling in the drawer trying to find the right cookie cutter. These are wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: greenbow

customer_reviews.title: K&S Artisan Stainless Steel Cookie Cutters - Perfect Product and Wonderful Customer Communication
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful set of biscuit cutters made out of beautiful stainless steel. K&S Artisan is a very impressive company that understands not only their products, but the raw materials used to manufacture their products. They are more than thorough and informed me that while the stainless steel biscuit cutters will not rust, the cutters need to be completely dry before storing in the provided tin which could cause rust. I will definitely keep K&S Artisan in mind anytime that I am purchasing items for the kitchen. Great product and Great Company.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Slagle

customer_reviews.title: High Quality Cookie Cutter Set!
customer_reviews.text: This a a high quality cutter set! I needed a certain size round cutter to make scones. This set had the exact size I was looking for. These are sturdy and well made. These are not the flimsy cutters you may have had before. The holder they come in is easy to store. They can also be used with fondant icing. With Christmas cookie baking I will use the large cutter along with a smaller one to make wreath cookies. I'm very happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Linda Wood

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: Top quality virtually seamless very smooth welded seam. The edge is thin and sharp but not too sharp to be dangerous, and the top is nicely rounded for easy cutting through dough. Last weekend I used the 2 inch for country biscuits it was the perfect size. The case they come in is sturdy and yet still compact. I highly recommend this set of cutters they will last a lifetime!
customer_reviews.author: HMD Amazonian

customer_reviews.title: Great tool for many baking uses
customer_reviews.text: Nothing to dislike so far, I just received the set and have used them once. A lot of variety of sizes, well marked. Made shortbread and used the largest size to make very clean cuts. I am pleased with set as well because they store so well, in their case. For a small kitchen, this is a bonus.
customer_reviews.author: Chava

customer_reviews.title: Best Doughnut Cutter
customer_reviews.text: K&S call this product "Cookie Cutters" but as the 11 supplied cutters are 1 1/4 inch high with varying diameters, I have used them to easily make doughnuts with just the right size center hole. The cutters are heavy gage "Food Grade Stainless Steel" with a special "seamless construction" and thick rolled top for grip and comfort. The cutting edge is sharp enough to work very well but not sharp enough to cut you. I highly recommend these cutters.
customer_reviews.author: upsididdle

customer_reviews.title: I have tried a lot of cutters over the years. This one is my favorite.
customer_reviews.text: When I am making dumplings of various sizes for various reason, I always know witch circle cutter to use. Their markings are clear. The cutters are sturdy, and I like that. The best cutters I have ever used. I started at 7 with my grandmother, I am now 64 spending time with my grandchildren in the kitchen. This product is a keeper for me. I would give it as a gift as well.
customer_reviews.author: Betty

customer_reviews.title: Great Find
customer_reviews.text: I order this set of cutters recently and they are great. I had been frustrated trying to find a set of cutters in local supply shops. I've been using these for cutting pasta dough for tortellini, ravioli and pierogi. They are very sturdy and uniform, high quality and they store compactly. I will also be using them for english muffins and much more.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, every size you'll ever need!
customer_reviews.text: Got these great little cutters and liked them so much I ordered another set for a friend for her birthday! The cutters are sturdy, have a nice rounded over edge on top to make them comfortable on hands. Found exactly the size I wanted for a one bite sized ginger cookie for the holidays. Wish I had bought a set of these years ago!
customer_reviews.author: NFLP

customer_reviews.title: Nice cutters
customer_reviews.text: The set has a nice range of sizes from 1 inch diameter to 3 1/2 inch diameter in 1/4 inch increments. I find the 3 1/2 inch to be a very good size for doughnuts etc, some sets go up to 4 1/2 inch but that is too big for my tastes. THe set is well made and comes in a sturdy tin.
customer_reviews.author: Tad Alder

customer_reviews.title: great purchase, highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: I love these cutters! I was using jar lids to cut biscuits and it was smashing the dough. These cutters cut sharp and clean so my biscuits are fluffy and tall now. I love having so many sizes nested in a convenient tin. Great purchase, highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: The container it comes in isn't a perfect fit since it doesn't seem to close correctly
customer_reviews.text: Makes clean cuts in the dough. The container it comes in isn't a perfect fit since it doesn't seem to close correctly, but putting them all in the container does save on space. Just be careful you don't drop the container or else you'll have to go looking for all the cutters.
customer_reviews.author: Shiang

customer_reviews.title: Not just for cookies.  Tons of ways to use them!
customer_reviews.text: Love them! I’ve used them to cut empanada dough and the ice cream for ice cream sandwiches )pioneer Woman recipe...look it up!) and I’m going to use them to cut polymer clay for jewelry ( the small ones of course). So many uses, so little time. They’re not just for cookies! Can’t wait to also use them for biscuits... see? Try them out. ❤️
customer_reviews.author: TwilightGrandma

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality, good value. I checked them when I received them and found no rough spots or bad welding. Try fit nicely together in the tin. I wish they were a little sharper, but I guess it's safer for children to use them when they're on the dull side.
customer_reviews.author: Mama Knight

customer_reviews.title: Best Cookie/Biscuit cutters I have ever used
customer_reviews.text: I love these cutters. I bake regularly and these are the best cookie/biscuit cutters I have ever used. I have used the flimsy ones that bend with the smallest amount of pressure and I have used glasses and coffee cups depending on the size I needed. This set has every size you will ever need. Every biscuit cut is clean and perfect. I would recommend these to anyone that bakes.
customer_reviews.author: Tamara J Ruffin

customer_reviews.title: Love the storage container & the cutters!
customer_reviews.text: I was very pleased that the biscuit cutters came in a storage container to keep them organized. I was also quite happy that there were so many sizes in the set. The metal was of a better quality than what I expected. Overall, I'm very pleased with my purchase and would purchase them again.
customer_reviews.author: Jeano

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with my purchase. I've always used a glass or cup to cut my biscuits but never achieved those beautiful layers, now I do! I love that they come with a convenient container to keep them all in one place too.
customer_reviews.author: Tonya

customer_reviews.title: but they worked very nicely. I like the fact that the sizes are ...
customer_reviews.text: I've only had a chance to use these a couple times since purchasing, but they worked very nicely. I like the fact that the sizes are embossed in the rings. I made homemade English Muffins and was able to get them just the right size. I like the container and just make sure to completely dry the cutter before replacing it into the tin, therefore, no issues with rust as some have complained.
customer_reviews.author: Past Midlife and OK with It

customer_reviews.title: Well made, sturdy, nice tin for storage
customer_reviews.text: Well made, strong and clever storage tin. Edges are finished, no sharp parts for children helping. These will be used often in our home and make nice stocking stuffer gifts for Christmas. Customer service responds quickly and politely to requests, they truly care about their product and the people who purchase from them. I will be watching for other baking products from this company.
customer_reviews.author: Granny

customer_reviews.title: Very well made
customer_reviews.text: I bought these cutters because I was planning on making baked semolina gnocchi. I only needed the 2" circle but I figured I'd go in for the whole set. I'm glad I did. They are very well made. They are of stainless steel, and yes, stainless steel will rust eventually, but I store the cutters in a plastic bag which I keep inside the tin container. I believe they will last for many years.
customer_reviews.author: Brophy

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Rings for Your Baking Needs!
customer_reviews.text: These rings are sturdy and hold their shape. Each ring also has it's dimension embedded on it which is a great help if you need a specific inch. They are a joy to use!
customer_reviews.author: Cecelia A. Lawshe

customer_reviews.title: There cookie cutters are excellent!
customer_reviews.text: These cookie cutters are excellent. They are strong and sharp enough to do the job well without hurting you. They also came with stencils which was a nice surprise to me. I am happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Flower1035

customer_reviews.title: You'll likely be using these for the rest of your cooking and baking lifetime.
customer_reviews.text: Well constructed, solid with permanent markings. Have used them for scones and I an convinced that they will probably outlive me with far fewer signs of wear.
customer_reviews.author: D. Barnard

customer_reviews.title: WAY BETTER than the rest!!!!
customer_reviews.text: These cutters are so well made! They have the perfect thickness, nice sharp edges for going through dough or cakes and I really appreciate how neatly they stack together and are kept in the portable container. This is a GREAT feature! You can tell that this company put a lot of through into their product. I HIGHLY recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: High Quality
customer_reviews.text: High quality. Various sizes for multiple uses. I have used for bisquits, cookies, and venting pie crusts. All of the cutter rings fit inside the convenient storage can.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Elrod

customer_reviews.title: Great set
customer_reviews.text: This is a great ring set. I have a ring set of four, but needed more options. The ring sizes provided here have already allowed me to make some great ice cream sandwiches with ice cream molded to the exact cookie size. I'll be glad to have these around when I'm making biscuits or cutting out corn bread and other cakes for special occasions.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to make homemade donuts and biscuits. When they arrived I was impressed with the packaging --the cutters come in a small tin box. The cutters themselves appear to be of good quality, solid and sturdy. With the busy season, I have yet to try them out. I love that there is barely a seam. They look of great quality for an excellent price.
customer_reviews.author: happy customer

customer_reviews.title: Circular as expected.
customer_reviews.text: They are round as expected and feel pretty solid, maintaining their shape well when being used. The lip is nice and noticeable, making them easy to grip. They are tall too, ensuring that you have plenty of clearance. There are a lot of sizes, which is always a plus. And they come with a storage tin, so you won't have a million cookie cutters flopping around in your drawer.
customer_reviews.author: David E Belcastro

customer_reviews.title: Love the tin
customer_reviews.text: I really like the tin these come in, it makes keeping them together so easy. There is a decent amount of weight to the cutters, so they do not feel like they will bend, plus the tin also helps to ensure they don't get deformed. My son, loves when I use the large one to cut the crust off his bread and give him a cool, circular sandwich.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce

customer_reviews.title: These are awesome. The quality is superb
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome. The quality is superb. No more riveted edges coming loose or sharp points. And the container tin is perfect. This is a good product. Plan to purchase for my grown kids' Christmas stocking stuffers, too.
customer_reviews.author: CHA

customer_reviews.title: Keep the tin dry — its not stainless only the cutters are.
customer_reviews.text: These cutters are incredible— very high quality. The different sizes are so useful since so many recipes call for a certain size round cutter, and i never had it. Id throw everything around the kichen trying to find something to substitute....NO MORE! I have the right size cutters now.
customer_reviews.author: Beth A. Lux

customer_reviews.title: ... set fr a different supplier which turned out to bad because it wasn't whathe I wanted and they wanted ...
customer_reviews.text: I came across this cutter set but ignored it and bought a set fr a different supplier which turned out to bad because it wasn't whathe I wanted and they wanted golf z price I paid for it to ship it back so I decide on buying this current 1 which is very good it's exactly what I was looking for. Knowing it's made from stainless steel is comforting and give a piece of mind I made a wise choice by buying this product keep up the good work
customer_reviews.author: Frass

customer_reviews.title: High quality.
customer_reviews.text: Good, high quality stainless. It does not appear that these will rust like other cutters. I like how they nest in their own container. Seems good so far, though I haven't been able to use them yet. Will update my review after use.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Love'em
customer_reviews.text: Love these! Good quality and will last a life time. They are not easy to bend. Comes in a nice tin to keep them all together. All the sizes are great and can use them for so many things. Very happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: J DUB

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: These are very well made. Come in a metal container that stays closed until you need them. The bonus of stencils was very nice and I've used them to decorate cakes and cookies with icing sugar.
customer_reviews.author: Big Boomer

customer_reviews.title: Great cookie cutters
customer_reviews.text: Great set. They are well made and the case is handy for storing them in. We got them for making cookies and donuts. Worked great and I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good but not accurate
customer_reviews.text: This is a well made product, the seams are very smooth and the top edge is rolled well and is comfortable to use. The only reason that I did not give it five stars, is that out of 11 rings, only one came close to an accurate measurement and that was an outside diameter not the diameter of the item being cut. Most were at least 1/8 " off. Perfect as long as accuracy is not a priority.
customer_reviews.author: ccquilter

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and well made . Good buy.
customer_reviews.text: Well made and like the container which stays closed . I’m using these for pottery and transport them to the studio so that is important . I have not used as yet but they look sturdy .
customer_reviews.author: Diane Young

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I was please with my purchase. I am using the biscuit cutters to make pottery and the various sizes were exactly what I was looking for. Each cutter is noted what size it is so that is helpful as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No rust means a happy gal
customer_reviews.text: I’ve only used this 3 times but has not rusted, can’t realky speak for durability because of that. They work great for biscuits
customer_reviews.author: Winston’s mom

customer_reviews.title: Received half my order.
customer_reviews.text: I’m bought this set because of extra stencils and tin container plus the ebook. Unfortunately I received half of the tin container and no extras as pictured. I will be returning this item for replacement or refund.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I definitely recommend this product
customer_reviews.text: I purposed purchased this product for cutting pie crust dough to put in mini muffin pans to make mini pies and the size I used from this set works well. And, all conveniently in it's storage case. After washing I immediately dry it after use is key. I definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Be

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy stainless with size markings!
customer_reviews.text: Love the size markings on these biscuit cutters. The stainless is quality and the seams are finished well. It comes with a handy container to keep them all together. This is a super set of cutters.
customer_reviews.author: Kermit Green

customer_reviews.title: They are good in appearance
customer_reviews.text: They are good in appearance. However, when I opened them, I found out there are 2 cutters (2 1/2 " and 2 1/4") which could not be put in the case levelly. See the photos. And there is a tiny steel which is not cut perfectly at the edge of the ring (2 1/2 "), I think that's the reason why it makes these 2 rings cannot be fitted in the case levelly. Is it normal when you guys receive the product? Or should I return it and replace for a good one?
customer_reviews.author: Chen Yi-Hsun

customer_reviews.title: Wow! All I needed was a 3" round and ...
customer_reviews.text: Wow! All I needed was a 3" round and doughnut hole cutter. What I got was two e-books, every size cookie cutter I will ever need, and a handy dandy little chart telling you which one is which size. They are well made and the storage tin is incredibly convenient. They are not kidding when they say "The BEST". Well worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Colleen C

customer_reviews.title: Great variety in a small tine
customer_reviews.text: The package arrived intact and tucked into a cute little tin. I haven't had the chance to use them, but can't wait. They will do nicely for a variety of items. They appear to be of wonderful quality and in perfect sizes.
customer_reviews.author: Marna Topping

customer_reviews.title: Crisp, clean cuts
customer_reviews.text: I love these cookie/biscuit cutters! They are very well made, heavy duty, cutters. 11 sizes makes them extremely versatile, and they work for biscuits and cookies. Round shape makes them more elegant than shaped cookie cutters.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Manz

customer_reviews.title: Great cookie cutters
customer_reviews.text: K&S Artisan is a very customer oriented company that cares about their product. The cutters have the smoothest connection seam I have ever seen - and I have a lot of cookie cutters! The stainless steel is strong and holds its shape very well and clean up easily. The variety of sizes ensures that you will have the size that you need, too!
customer_reviews.author: Bluebonnet

customer_reviews.title: UPON INSPECTION OF THIS PRODUCT, I CAN TELL THEY WILL DEFINITELY LAST A LIFETIME
customer_reviews.text: I HAVEN'T USED THEM YET ,I OPENED THE PACKAGE AND WAS PLEASANTLY SURPRISED, THE BISCUIT CUTTERS ARE DEFINITELY A QUALITY PRODUCT,I AM SO HAPPY THAT I DECIDED TO PURCHASE THEM,I WILL ORDER FROM THIS COMPANY ANYTIME, THANK YOU FOR MAKING ABSOLUTE QUALITY PRODUCTS!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: lori a.

customer_reviews.title: Well made and very versatile
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these to use as cake cutters for a small cake. I loved the variety of having different sizes to use not just with the cake but with creating the decorations. They versatile and i plan to use them when i make cookies too.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Tool for the Potter
customer_reviews.text: Love these cutters. I purchased them to use when I throw pottery. On the potter's wheel, not against the wall. I can use them for hours when I'm throwing my ceramic sponge-holders and they don't rust. Top-notch product. I'll add a photo of what I use them for. :)
customer_reviews.author: Cyber-Shop Until I Drop

customer_reviews.title: They work!
customer_reviews.text: I had been looking for shapes like these for making crackers that are the same shape as the planet Mars, and these fit the bill! Also works for crackers of other planetary shapes, traffic circles, jar lids, soccer balls viewed from above, clocks, dartboards, and primitive wheels.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Hennessey

customer_reviews.title: Great for biscuits!
customer_reviews.text: Great set of high quality biscuit cutters made of heavy duty metal. Very easy to handle and clean up quickly. Love the seamless rims/sides for smooth even cutting. This order came with two pdf recipe books that give a variety of recipes that involve the use of the cutters. I used the larger sized cutter for making buttermilk biscuits and they worked very well. Looking forward to making some canepes/appetizers for my next social gathering.
customer_reviews.author: Aidee

customer_reviews.title: and wife is happy with them
customer_reviews.text: Mr. SallyJane here. Wife bought them, and wife is happy with them. Can't get much better than that since in our household she is the head chef while I am the sou chef. She uses them more for cutting out biscuits than for cookies.
customer_reviews.author: sallyjane

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great price, fast shipping.
customer_reviews.text: The biscuit cutters were exactly what I needed. We received them quickly, they were packed well and even followed up with a note explaining the material that they were made of and the container that they came in. This will help preserve them for years. Very appreciative of the quality and service of this product. Would certainly order this product again as a gift for friends or family.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: Good craftsmanship. The biscuit cutters made of good quality rusty resistant stainless steel. The storage tin is not and may rust without proper care. I know this because before my cutters arrived, K&S sent me an email advising me of such. They instructed me to ensure the cutters are dried before storing in the tin. I actually took that notification as a positive and welcomed the conscientiousness.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie  - Westchester, NY

customer_reviews.title: They seem to be a waste. The normal sizes seem to be good quality
customer_reviews.text: Just received them. They came on-time. I have not used them yet. Most of the smaller sizes I would not use. They seem to be a waste. The normal sizes seem to be good quality. I bought this for biscuits, not cookies.
customer_reviews.author: Donna E.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I love the fact that the measurement is listed on each cutter. So far they have been great to use and easy to clean. If that changes I'll let you know! I like too that they nest so neatly in the tin they came in and take up very little space.
customer_reviews.author: Patti Goodale

customer_reviews.title: Perfect round cookie or biscuit cutter set
customer_reviews.text: Great variety of sizes, very nice weight, easy to clean. These nest nicely in a small round case. Perfect for biscuits, cookies, donuts of any size. Exactly what I needed and i expect they will last forever.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Ann

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I was pleased to see these were sturdy cutters that cut through raw dough as well as already baked goods. They aren't flimsy like others sets I've invested in. The sizes of each circle cutter are printed on them and that is very helpful. I highly recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: c

customer_reviews.title: Pleased
customer_reviews.text: Received these quickly. Lovely stainless steel set - so many sizes - perfect for every day and holiday baking. The storage tin is handy too - no more searching for loose cutters in every drawer. The seller does explain that the storage tin is not stainless, so can rust... so cutters should be dried before storing. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Jane Keffer

customer_reviews.title: Product recommended for durability, safety and convenience.
customer_reviews.text: Good quality product. I particularly like that the respective sizes are clearly marked on the outside of each cutting mold. I also like that the cutting circles have a sturdy “rolled” top which safely allows me to press down on the mold; a feature that should help maintain the circular shape intact after years of use. And I love the convenience of having this set neatly stored in its own box.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. and Mrs. Letterio Asciuto

customer_reviews.title: Perfect condition
customer_reviews.text: As a pastry chef these are essential. Thank you for the quick delivery. The only disappointing fact was that they are made in China.
customer_reviews.author: Kate McEnery

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful cutters!
customer_reviews.text: I got these the other day and have used them twice already! They are of good quality and clean easily - They cut thru dough with no problem. I'm very happy with the variety of sizes... Can use for doughnuts, cookies, biscuits.. even for small pancakes! Great price & Product!
customer_reviews.author: T. A. McKinney

customer_reviews.title: These cutters are 5-star quality and well worth the price
customer_reviews.text: I am tired of having a drawer full of twisted and mangled cheap cutters that I have to straighten out every time I need one. The case they came in, to me was an added bonus. A sturdy metal container to keep everything together in one organized package and protected in the drawer. This product is a must buy for anyone's kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Mac Farsider

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality - Work Great
customer_reviews.text: These are great. They are very good quality. I love that they can be stored in the little can they come in. That's one of the reasons I bought them. I used the 2 1/2" circle to make shortbread cookies. It cut through the dough easily and was very easy to remove the dough. I'm planning to make some doughnut shaped cookies using the largest and smallest sizes.
customer_reviews.author: 1Alan B

customer_reviews.title: Useful
customer_reviews.text: I use these for cookies, biscuits, petite fours and the like. There’s a wide range of sizes and I get a nice clean circle. Easy to clean and store.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as advertised. These are ideal for the home cook or baker and if taken care of will last for years. Be sure and dry them off before putting them in the storage container. While the cutters are stainless the storage container is not, if water should drip off the cutter into the storage container the storage container will rust.
customer_reviews.author: Pepper

product_meta.title: K&S Artisan Heavy Duty Biscuit Cutter set 11 100% Stainless Steel Circle Cookie Cutters Round for Pastry Donuts & Scone Commercial Quality Rings Baking molds 3 Cookie & Coffee Stencils
feature_bullets: ✅ 11 graduated Biscuits cutters : plain crisp edge on bottom to cut BISCUITS, doughnuts, fondant, scones, cookies, sandwiches, pastries, canapes, crumpets, mini cakes & pie, stored neatly in compact storage tin

✅ SMOOTH polished sides Rustproof circle molds Commercial Grade STRONG Stainless Steel Constructed of strong 18/8 FOOD GRADE 304 STAINLESS STEEL ●✔ BPA-free ●✔NO RUST ●✔Dishwasher safe ●✔ BEAUTIFUL storage tin ●✔No more Clutter!●✔Fully stainless steel Rolled top edges to protect fingers making it ●✔comfortable and Easy to use ●✔ FULLY WELDED SEAMS.Our cutters have ●✔ No sharp dangerous seams superior quality to other brands

✅ Food grade HEAVY DUTY Stainless Steel , ensuring your family is kept completely safe.●✔TESTED to be Oven & Gas SAFE! ●✔Solid dough cutter set + Biscuit & cake eBook recipes and much more! + 4 Cookie & coffee stencils( BONUS

✅ FREE EXTRA BONUS 3 Coffee stencils for Latte Cappuccino,Beautiful and cute design,Little positive thing in the morning can really change the mood of the whole day! you can also use them for decorating cakes,cookies and cupcakes.

✅Professional Baking Dough Tools Cut out DONUTS , pastry dough, crackers, tarts, English muffin, bread, ravioli pasta, fruit, vegetable, even clay. Form burger patties, appetizers & hors d'ouevre These multiple circular rings are not only for baking and cooking You can use them as timbale food rings for FORMING & PLATING BEAUTIFULLY - a High quality bakeware tool set for foodies, bakers, cooks & caterers in every kitchen.
